interface.name: quota_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute quota management tools in the quota domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: quota_run
interface.summary: Execute quota management tools in the quota domain, and allow the specified role the quota domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the quota domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the quota domain to use.

interface.name: quota_dontaudit_getattr_db
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of filesystem quota data files.

interface.name: quota_manage_flags
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete quota flag files.
